name: Beach Boy Bastian
description:
Beach Boy Bastian is a game in which Bastian sells Lemonade to become really rich. It was made for VimJam3 and is the prequal of "Bastians Biggest Bet". The Theme was "Turn up the Heat" and the Restriction was "Multi-Use".

Controls are in the game but if you want to read them again here they are:   
- Space to talk during the cutscene 
- WASD to move
- Click on things while standing near them to interact with them
- After every day you can buy upgrades, THERE ARE MULTIPLE PAGES!
- Customers will only tell you what ingredient they want, as long as the ingredient is in the recepie, they’ll buy it 

Programmed by: Pk Moritz
Music and Sound by: Smartulu
Art by: Noodle
Voiceacting and Playtesting by: Hapysol

Making this game was really fun! Huge thanks to everyone who helped.
Enjoy!
